Item_Gold.name: Gold
Item_Gold.description: This coin, minted from tin and gold, is currently the most popular currency across the land.

Item_FakeDiamond.name: Dark Crystal
Item_FakeDiamond.description: Contains unstable energy and is sometimes used as a power source. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.

Item_Diamond.name: Tanium
Item_Diamond.description: Stable crystals, most commonly used for energy supply. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.

Item_Achievement.name: Achievement
Item_Achievement.description: Points gained after accomplishing an achievement. Accumulate achievement and claim rewards on the achievement page.

Item_VeraCoin.name: Mira
Item_VeraCoin.description: The currency issued by and circulates in Mirroria. Can be used on vending machines, service stations, restaurants, and other facilities across Mirroria.

None.name: Activation Core II
None.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.

EquipFragment.name: Base Chip
EquipFragment.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

item_GreatRegression_coin.name: Proof of Stellarway
item_GreatRegression_coin.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.

Item_VeraCoinRare.name: Old Vera Coin
Item_VeraCoinRare.description: Old Mirroria currency that is already out of circulation. It's said that you can still use these coins on some gachapon machines.

Blindbox_coin_01.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_01.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.

Item_Enlightenment.name: Aidan Coin
Item_Enlightenment.description: Event Currency for Road of Strife

Item_Reputation1.name: Astra bounty coin
Item_Reputation1.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of a crashed airship. Can be used to exchange for special items.

Item_AssistContribution.name: Support points
Item_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped new Wanderers. Imprinted with an image for mutual support. Join Team Support System to get.

Item_SummerCoin_01.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_01.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges' residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.

WeaponFragment.name: Black Gold
WeaponFragment.description: Token forged by smiths from old Omnium weapons. Circulated only in special markets. Redeemable for weapons.

GenePointItem_Attack.name: Originum (Attack)
GenePointItem_Attack.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.description: Miniature energy crystals generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value. Use them to exchange for resources at the Store.

item_GuildMeritorious.name: Merit
item_GuildMeritorious.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

Item_Vera_RaceToken.name: Race point
Item_Vera_RaceToken.description: Obtained by participating in group races.

HomeOre.name: Metal Material
HomeOre.description: Collected from machine pods or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store Workshop and building upgrades.

HomePumpkin.name: Fiber Material
HomePumpkin.description: Collected from the Pumpkin House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeRattan.name: Energy Material
HomeRattan.description: Collected from the Pawpaw House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeMeat.name: Supply Materials
HomeMeat.description: Collected from the Kitty House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeTwigs.name: Accessory Materials
HomeTwigs.description: Collected from the Turtle House or dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (The Hyenas, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa, Devourer). Can be used for Exchange Store, Workshop, and building upgrades.

HomeFish.name: Quality Materials
HomeFish.description: Dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (Ravagers, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa). Can be used to upgrade the Exchange Store, Workshop, and buildings.

HomeFishBones.name: Composite Materials
HomeFishBones.description: Dropped by Artificial Island Building Mode creatures (Ravagers, Apophis, Robarg, Barbarossa). Can be used to upgrade the Exchange Store, Workshop, and buildings.

HomeShellfish.name: Tech Store Token
HomeShellfish.description: A universal token of Banges Tech. Can be exchanged and used in the Exchange Store.

GenePointItem_Assist.name: Originum (Support)
GenePointItem_Assist.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

GenePointItem_Def.name: Originum (Feature)
GenePointItem_Def.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.

Item_RegressionCoin.name: Raid Coin
Item_RegressionCoin.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a mechanical windmill relief. Use them to exchange for resources at the Return Shop.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.description: Miniature energy crystals generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value. Use them to exchange for resources at the Store.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.description: Miniature energy crystals generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value. Use them to exchange for resources at the Store.

Hopkins1.name: Gold-backed card
Hopkins1.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.

item_sharephotocoin.name: Amusement park
item_sharephotocoin.description: Obtained by playing amusement facilities on the Cetus Island. Use them to exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards at Enfi on the island.

WeaponFragment_UP1.name: Flame gold (Red Lotus)
WeaponFragment_UP1.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

WeaponFragment_UP2.name: Flame Gold (Flame)
WeaponFragment_UP2.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

EquipFragment_UP1.name: Overclocking Chip (Red Lotus)
EquipFragment_UP1.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production.

EquipFragment_UP2.name: Overclocking Chip (Flame)
EquipFragment_UP2.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production.

Hopkins2.name: Proof of credit
Hopkins2.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.

Item_Incarnation_01.name: Offering points
Item_Incarnation_01.description: Special tokens minted by Hykros to encourage collecting mana bio samples.

WeaponFragment_UP3.name: Flame gold (White Moon)
WeaponFragment_UP3.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.

WeaponFragment_UP9.name: Flame Gold (Shadow)
WeaponFragment_UP9.description:
Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel. Redeemable for limited weapons.
Dazzling lights refracted endlessly yet frighteningly never fade away.

Item_Aida_token.name: Aida Keepsake
Item_Aida_token.description: Judgement is nigh. A new day shall dawn in fire.

Item_Aida_photo_token.name: Encrypted Disk
Item_Aida_photo_token.description: A heavily encrypted disk with critical data. Maybe someone in Hykros can crack it...?

Item_Incarnation_02.name: Proof of Contribution
Item_Incarnation_02.description: The certificate made by the Hykros Logistics Department, which records the efforts and contributions of the Executor.

Blindbox_coin_02.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_02.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.

mount_006_coin.name: Exhibition Coupon
mount_006_coin.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.name: Spacetime Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.description: Crystal dust that escaped from the trajectory of spacetime. Seems to be able to affect the stability of spacetime fragments.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.name: Spacetime Crystal Fragments
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.description: These fragments floating in the trajectory of spacetime operations are the products of shattered spacetime.

activation1.name: Activation Core I
activation1.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.

activation2.name: Surfrider Emblem
activation2.description:
An emblem earned from the Whitewater Race at Banges Port.
It can be redeemed for items from the Whitewater Race event store.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.name: Pacemaker Emblem
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.description:
An emblem earned from the Mirroria Tour, hosted by the HOTTA Studio. See Mirroria from an all-new perspective!
Can be redeemed for items from the Mirroria Tour event store.

Item_Enlightenment_02.name: Star scatter
Item_Enlightenment_02.description: Fine shards of stars that refract the light from outer space.

Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.name: Enigmatic Badge
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.description: The badge given to the HOTTA Studio's Enigmatic Lattice event participants. Come one, come all!

item_Regression_AssistContribution.name: Return Support Points
item_Regression_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped return Executors. Obtain by teaming up with returning Executors and participating in gameplay.
